name: Aakash Gorthy
motto: Never give up

name: Aayush Mohanty
motto: Robotics is the start to an engineering career.

name: Alex Zajac
motto: Feels good to get your hands dirty.

name: Audrey Rabick
motto: My two favorite historic inventions are duct tape and whiteboards.

name: Briana Kohl
motto: When life throws a swerve at you, make lemonade.

name: Cade Peterman
motto: I'm not a quotable person. Yay robots?

name: Carter Briggs
motto: Engineering is solving problems you didn't know you had in ways you don't understand.

name: Casey Murray
motto: I like to learn how things work, then take that knowledge and make something of it.

name: Cassie Nash
motto: This is just a warm-up, next we build a TARDIS.

name: Cole Sherwood
motto: Stryke Force hours- 24:7

name: David Herr
motto: Learn from your mistakes and successes to achieve new challenging problems.

name: David Jin
motto: Every successful person started out as a failure.

name: Ethan Lee
motto: Don't call it a dream. Call it a plan.

name: Greg Redlon
motto: There wouldn’t be good times without the tough times.

name: Hung Huynh
motto: Reach for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.

name: Hunter McGillivray
motto: Allow one to interpret your creation before you tell them how

name: Jack Bruinwood
motto: Two robots drove into a bar, the third one had me as a driver.

name: Jacob Woessner
motto: I like to play magic the gathering

name: Jager Doorn
motto: Talent is overrated. Eighty percent of success in life is showing up. The rest is integrity and perseverance.

name: Jiawen Fan
motto: Open your eyes so dreams become true

name: Jonathan Koh
motto: Work hard play hard

name: Kjerstin Lindbloom
motto: Uniqueness is what I strive for, awkwardness is what I have.

name: Kris Ouvry
motto: Stryke Force Yellow: a man-made marvel seen from space.

name: Lilian Gates
motto: It's always a software problem.

name: Nina Herschleb
motto: I'm the gofer, I do whatever people need.

name: Ranya Liu
motto: Came for the food, stayed for the robot.

name: Roberts Kalnins
motto: I'm trilingual — I speak English, Latvian, and Java.

name: Ross Malackowski
motto: Stryke Force helps me fly!

name: Ryan Lehoczky
motto: Robot is a way of life.

name: Sam Breuer
motto: Did somebody say scouting, I'm so glad you asked!

name: Sam Rabick
motto: If we accepted the sky as the limit, we would never have put a man on the moon.

name: Siddharth Tiwar
motto: There's no 'I' in team

name: Sierra Staunton
motto: Leaders aren't those who love to win, but those who hate to lose.

name: Tingfeng Luo
motto: Going bald for coding.

name: Zach McDougal
motto: I build robots and I know things.

name: Zach Zlomek
motto: Most people say "if it ain't broke, don't fix it". Engineers say "if it ain't broke, there aren't enough features yet".
